summary: Completed frontend testing for Growth Charts coordinate calibration. All 6 test cases PASSED - WHO and CDC charts correctly plot data points, gender switching works, and chart type switching works.
passed_tests: TEST 1: WHO Weight-for-age 50th percentile values (0mo/3.3kg, 12mo/9.6kg, 24mo/12.2kg) - Points added and visible on chart - PASSED
TEST 2: WHO chart corner test (0mo/2kg bottom-left, 24mo/16kg top-right) - Corner points added successfully - PASSED
TEST 3: CDC Stature-Weight chart - Both stature (blue) and weight (red) points visible in respective chart sections - PASSED
TEST 4: CDC chart positioning - 2yr points at left edge, 18yr points at right edge - PASSED
TEST 5: Chart type switching - WHO/CDC tabs work correctly, displays correct chart - PASSED
TEST 6: Gender switching - Boys/Girls selector works, chart updates with correct gender-specific colors and data - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: GrowthChartPage.jsx: WHO_CHARTS coordinates correctly configured - viewBox 1122.5197x793.70074, grid X:148-984, Y:167-669
GrowthChartPage.jsx: CDC_CHARTS coordinates correctly configured - viewBox 816x1056, stature grid Y:382-83, weight grid Y:702-163
GrowthChartPage.jsx: calculateSvgCoords function correctly implements linear interpolation for coordinate mapping
GrowthChartPage.jsx: Points rendered as SVG circles with numbered labels (1,2,3... for WHO; S1,W1,S2,W2... for CDC)
GrowthChartPage.jsx: Gender-specific styling applied correctly (blue for boys, pink for girls)
GrowthChartPage.jsx: TransformWrapper enables pinch-to-zoom and pan functionality for chart interaction
GrowthChartPage.jsx: Save PNG functionality implemented using html-to-image library
context_for_next_testing_agent: Growth Charts coordinate calibration verified. Navigation: Login -> I Agree -> NICU card -> Growth Charts (or direct URL /nicu/growth). WHO charts (0-2 years): Weight-for-age, Length-for-age, BMI-for-age. CDC charts (2-20 years): Stature & Weight, BMI-for-age. Key test values: WHO 50th percentile - 0mo/3.3kg, 12mo/9.6kg, 24mo/12.2kg. CDC test values - 2yr/87cm/12.5kg, 18yr/176cm/68kg. Points are plotted as colored circles with numbered labels. Blue for boys/stature, pink for girls, red for weight on CDC charts.
